message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

This paper is about text classification using convolutional neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the natural language processing (NLP) field. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the importance of depth in convolutional models, which is a common topic in machine learning and deep learning research, hence cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also likely. The use of convolutional networks for text classification involves image-like processing of text, which relates to computer vision, hence cs.CV (Computer Vision) is another possible sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of word embeddings, which is a technique commonly used in information retrieval, hence cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the performance of different models, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence research, hence cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a possible sub-category.
